Articles.Content: Was hoping someone knew of or could make a CTT patch for Kerbal founderies that spreads the wheels/tracks out instead of having them all in one node.
So, i guess no-one's up for doing this?

It's ridiculously easy to make a module manager config for this.. it would just be a big text file with a whole lot of:

@PART[aaaaaaaaa]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
    @TechRequired = bbbbbbbbb
}

@PART[ccccccccccc]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
    @TechRequired = dddddddddd
}

The hard part is figuring out what part should go in what node.

I can help with the syntax, but I don't have any opinions on where the parts should go since I don't use that mod.

Edit: actually, here's the whole config. Just modify the TechRequired as you like. Save as "KF-CTT.cfg" or something with .cfg in your GameData.


@PART[KF_AuxiliaryPowerUnit]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_Repulsor]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_RepulsorGimbal]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_RepulsorSurface]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_RoverBodyLarge]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_ScrewDrive]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_Skid]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_SurfaceTrack]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackLong]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackMedium]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackRBIInverting]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackRBIMole]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackRBITiny]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackS]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_TrackSmall]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_WheelLarge]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_WheelMedium]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_WheelSmall]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
@PART[KF_WheelTiny]:NEEDS[CommunityTechTree]
{
  @TechRequired = advancedMotors
}
